title: CryptopreneurBrainboss
author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
content: QuoteFormer President Olusegun Obasanjo has formally endorsed Mr Peter Obi of the Labour Party as his preferred candidate for the 2023 presidential election. TheNewsGuru.com (TNG) reports Obasanjo endorsed Peter Obi as his preferred candidate in his New Year message to Nigerians. The former president said: “None of the contestants is a saint but when one compares their character, antecedent, their understanding, knowledge, discipline, and vitality that they can bring to bear and the great efforts required to stay focused on the job, particularly looking at where the country is today and with the experience on the job that I personally had, Peter Obi as a mentee has an edge.“Others like all of us have what they can collectively contribute to the new dispensation to liberation, restoration and salvaging of Nigeria. One other important point to make about Peter is that he is a needle with thread attached to it from North and South and he may not get lost. “In other words, he has people who can pull his ears, if and when necessary. He has a young and able running mate with a clean track record of achievement both in public and private life”. TNG reports the New Year message personally signed by the ex-President was released by his spokesman, Kehinde Akinyemi.Source: https://thenewsguru.com/politics/breaking-obj-officially-endorses-peter-obi-for-president/I know say una go dun hear this news from the different social platforms wey we dey but I say make I bring am here make we reason one or two. Without any bias make una talk truth, you think say this message from OBJ na him genuine mind abi another political decision so him enemy Atiku no go get supports to fit win the election or to make sure the likes of Tinubu no enta that seat as him fit do things wey go make OBJ not relevant again for Nigeria. Also you feel say this decision from OBJ na another from to make himself relevant so Incase OBI win him fit carry shoulder up say na him put am there and try get benefits with godfather parole.  Within you think about this decision by OBJ entirely?.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Dis mata don set d media and political space agog, but na good tin bcos Obasanjo na elder statesman wey mean well 4 Naija. I no care d bad tin wey d guy don do 4 d past, e don change, and any analyst wey mean well 4 Naija go know say Peter Obi na d best candidate 4 us as tins be. Shey na Atiku wey be Fulani wey don rule us bad for 8 years and still corrupt, or na Tinubu wey be d most corrupt politician 4 Naija?I be South-west guy but South-east na part of Naija too, make dem allow dem do am. To crown d mata, na dem (South-east) get d best candidate for d election. Peter Obi na d youngest, disciplined, apologetic, accountable, vibrant, talented, and trustworthy with a track record among many others.Na d qualities Naija desperately need right now. May God save us all!

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: People wey dey talk say this endorsement no mean say PO don automatic win election because him get the backing of OBJ dem dey correct. But political endorsement from an elder statesman like Obasanjo really means a lot.. E fit no make sense to everybody but e make sense for persons wey get eyes to see. E just be like C.Ronaldo wey recently signed for Al Nassr. Before the signing, Al Nassr been get 850k followers on Instagram but after the signing, their followers come increase to 2.4M within 24 hrs and currently has 7.4M followers. E get some persons wey na diehard supporters and fans of OBJ and because of this endorsement dem go throw their hats for PO, so it's a plus for PO and LP.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: From my own view,OBJ dey try to correct things for the country, unto say when e bin dey power to make things good for the country, he no do am instead na e put this country for all these mess. I see say e don get conscience and won try e best to see whether e go fit help Nigeria get good leader to free him mind from wetin dey hunt am.If na base on politics, I no come know about that one but na the truth na e OBJ dey talk,if say Nigerians fit see and understand wetin OBJ dey talk,e for make sense because na on PO be d man wey fit save Nigeria from this backwardness.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: One tin wey we need realize first be say , OBJ na politician. Inasmuch as he claim to have Nigeria at heart, the same system na em form am and give am recognition.Whether he endorses Obi or not, the election votes will decide and the winner will be declared. We also been hear of Wike wey dey support PDP now, I don't know how true that is but the underlining fact is that this is politics and only we the citizens can decide with our votes.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Endorsing a candidate na good thing to me especially when it comes from an elderly man that have the interest of the people at heart. But dis is not same for Nigeria again, we don’t know who is who again, whether they’re playing politics with us or not. At dis point, I go talk say we are all wise enough to know wetin good for our country, we go decide ourselves who go be the next president without favoring anyone endorsed by anybody. Our votes will decide and not the endorsement. I hope the best person amongst them succeed and becomes the next president.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: If you cross-review all this top 3 presidential candidates(Tinubu, Atiku and Obi) records of how the take rule for Nigeria during their time, you go use your head know which peso better pass the other. Wetin Obasanjo owes Nigeria as an elder statesman na to tell us the truth for peso wey suppose rule Nigeria. Na why endorsed Obi because em do check all the presidential aspirant's wey come out, na Obi wey em see as the best candidate. As Nigeria be so, no be the time to be sentimental for election base on tribe or religion. The yoruba elders don come out opening to endorse Obi even some top Northerners don do so join, not to talk to Ohaneze nde Igbo(Igbo elders)Whether Obi win or not, Obasanjo no get anything to gain or lose. Em don achieve and accomplish so many things for em  life. By the way, he is respected for Africa and the whole world

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: I respect OBJ well well o, becos em done rule the country before as head of state and civilian, OBJ Don dey involved in government since the days of Aguiyi Johnson so em know waiting real governance really be, Him endorsing Peter obi means say em really mean well for the country, I no dey do sentimental politics sha, but if am to choose and for the sake of fairness I go vote Peter Obi, even if all of them dey lie na only Peter obi plans I know say if em execute  am wen me reach office e go carry our country forward, em dey young , vibrant and educated, the election is between Peter obi, Atiku and BAT. So for ObJ to endorse am the old man know waiting em dey do, so make we sit down watch how the game go play out come February 2025,  cos it's either we dey Obient or we dey atikulated or we dey BATified.

comments.body: Waiting OBJ they talk make sense sha but the thing be say no matter how he be if politicians help each other and you win last last na them go wan they use you and dey control you, make OBJ no come with another method do us shege like before because no one to be trust, and for the peter obi upon say me I no too know him well I still get mind dey think am say him go better pass ATiku and tinubu because those two people eyes dey nigeria resources

comments.body: Quote from: CryptopreneurBrainboss on January 03, 2023, 07:30:32 AM Within you think about this decision by OBJ entirely?. Personally many people dey support Obi well, na just say dem never too go far for politics to openly talk against Atiku and Tinubu, na why dem just dey undercover. If in the remaining days to the election, more political daddies in our country start to dey coe out dey endorse OBI, e go cause problem for other political parties.

I been dey listen to radio during the new year. Alhaji Dan Tata wey be Dangote's uncle during him new year message been talk say people wey offend am him forgive them and people wey him offend say abeg make them forgive am, say like this him dey very old and na death wey him dey wait for. E get age wey person go reach wey nothing make sense again. U go just want dey at peace with yourself because u don see life finish. OBJ na ex-president, if na money him get am, if na national and international recognition him get am. E fit be say him conscience dey judge am for the things wey him don do or things wey him suppose do during him tenure wey him been no do and him believe say PO fit do better. This is just my thoughts. But if you don the hear the 3 main presidential candidates (BAT, PO and Atiku) talk, na only PO get something meaningful to say, am not saying he's a saint but that's just the truth. Atiku wey talk say make the north vote for the north because him no say na them be majority, abi no be the same problem everybody dey face for this country, abi fuel na N50/litre for north and N179/litre for other parts of Nigeria or kidnapping, bad roads, poverty no dey for north. Same Atiku talk say him understand the problem of Nigeria because him marry wifes from all parts of Nigeria so na him dey best qualify to rule Nigeria... Oga are you okay? BAT no dey medically and mentally fit to rule Nigeria. We no need another president wey go dey tour the world because of health issues... We never recover for Buhari own, him just believe say na him turn to rule because him been get agreement with Buhari and APC.

comments.body: Everybody get sins to atone for including OBJ. And I see say na wetin him dey try do. I just feel say dem dey do am for conscience sake because these men and women have nothing to lose, their time is short and they have made more than enough money for their unborn generations. Well, e nor too taye again result go show.
